name: subzone
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an area that forms part of a larger area: Each zone is divided into two subzones. He was appointed as the head of finance in the sub-zone.
More examplesFewer examplesThe website has subzones for students of different levels.The wine-growing area has a number of different subzones and a wide variety of soil types.No new housing developments are permitted in this subzone. This subzone of the park includes picnic areas and campsites.
